Title: Death Smiles on a Murderer
Writer: Claudio Bernabei (screenplay), Joe D'Amato (screenplay), Joe D'Amato (story), Romano Scandariato (screenplay)
Actors: Klaus Kinski, Ewa Aulin, Angela Bo, Sergio Doria
Plot: A man discovers an ancient Incan formula for raising the dead, and uses it for a series of revenge murders.
